summary: Earth sends a five-man team to explore the frozen planet Uranus, only to find a temperate forest and sultry women from their past on it, courtesy of an alien brain with evil designs.
cast: John Agar|Carl Ottosen|Ove Sprogøe|Louis Miehe-Renard|Peter Mönch|Greta Thyssen|Ann Smyrner|Mimi Heinrich|Annie Birgit Garde|Ulla Moritz|Bente Juul|Julian Burton
keywords: uranus the planet|mind control|space exploration|psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie
director: Director: Sidney W. Pink (as Sidney Pink)
title: Viaje al séptimo planeta
